statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 5 \\ -1 \\ 4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -15 \\ 3 \\ -12 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -7 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 5 \\ -1 \\ 4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -15 \\ 3 \\ -12 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -7 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
